Docs.summary: Information you can retrieve about hardware configuration preferences declared by an application.

remarks.para: Information you can retrieve about hardware configuration preferences declared by an application. This corresponds to information collected from the AndroidManifest.xml's <uses-configuration> and <uses-feature> tags.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: This method extracts the major and minor version of reqGLEsVersion attribute and returns it as a string.
Docs.value: String representation of the reqGlEsVersion attribute

remarks.para: This method extracts the major and minor version of reqGLEsVersion attribute and returns it as a string. Say reqGlEsVersion value of 0x00010002 is returned as 1.2
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The GLES version used by an application.

remarks.para: The GLES version used by an application. The upper order 16 bits represent the major version and the lower order 16 bits the minor version.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Flags associated with the input features.

remarks.para: Flags associated with the input features. Any combination of #INPUT_FEATURE_HARD_KEYBOARD, #INPUT_FEATURE_FIVE_WAY_NAV

remarks.para: Application's input method preference. One of: android.content.res.Configuration#KEYBOARD_UNDEFINED, android.content.res.Configuration#KEYBOARD_NOKEYS, android.content.res.Configuration#KEYBOARD_QWERTY, android.content.res.Configuration#KEYBOARD_12KEY

Docs.summary: A flag indicating whether any keyboard is available.

remarks.para: A flag indicating whether any keyboard is available. one of: android.content.res.Configuration#NAVIGATION_UNDEFINED, android.content.res.Configuration#NAVIGATION_DPAD, android.content.res.Configuration#NAVIGATION_TRACKBALL, android.content.res.Configuration#NAVIGATION_WHEEL
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The kind of touch screen attached to the device.

remarks.para: The kind of touch screen attached to the device. One of: android.content.res.Configuration#TOUCHSCREEN_NOTOUCH, android.content.res.Configuration#TOUCHSCREEN_STYLUS, android.content.res.Configuration#TOUCHSCREEN_FINGER.
